title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a girl kissing a girl on the mouth from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a girl kissing a girl on the mouth is one of the dreams that, in addition to anxiety and overthinking, can cause extreme strangeness to the dreamer, and despite this strangeness, the vision carries many interpretations and meanings.Interpretation of a dream about a girl kissing a girl on the mouthSeeing a girl in a dream being kissed by another girl Evidence that in the coming period she will obtain a lot of money from a forbidden source and this will cause her many problems in her life. If the girl sees that the kiss is lustful, this indicates the abundance of food and great goodness that she will obtain in her life. If a man sees in a dream that there is A girl kisses another girl on the mouth, and this causes him to desire it. This is evidence that in the coming period he will fall into bad ways and make many mistakes in his life, and this will bring him trouble, sadness, and great loss. Interpretation of a dream about a girl kissing a girl on the mouth by Ibn Sirin, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation Sirin, seeing a girl in a dream kissing another girl on the mouth is evidence that she will soon be exposed to many crises and problems that will require a lot of effort and thinking to find an appropriate solution. The vision also shows the forbidden things that the wise girl does in secret, which in this case she does. It serves as a warning to quickly repent to God so that he is not punished in the end. Interpretation of a dream about a girl kissing a girl on the mouth for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream that she is sitting among a group and that they are kissing each other and this is disturbing her means that she will meet some bad friends in her life who will try to deceive her and encourage her to Doing wrong actions and following the forbidden ways of people. A girl seeing in a dream that another girl is kissing her and she is happy about this, in reality leads her to some problems and crises, making her fall into a state of severe depression. Anyone who sees her kissing a girl with great desire is evidence that he He will soon obtain a lot of goodness and achieve his goals, dreams, and everything he wants, but he will get all of this after a lot of suffering and exhaustion. There is another interpretation that says: If a girl sees in her dream that a girl kisses a girl and this increases her desire, this means that she will commit sins and mistakes and will not You understand the extent of this sin only after a long time. . General.A girl can really feel passion and desire and this is reflected in her dreams. In this case the dream does not express anything. Sometimes a girl does not feel safe in her life and her emptiness, so she draws strength and satisfies her passion with these dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a girl kissing a girl on the mouth for a married woman: For a married woman, if she sees in her dream that there is a girl kissing a girl on the mouth and this causes her great enthusiasm, this indicates forbidden money. Which she will get by entering into an illegal enterprise and has severe deprivation. If a married woman sees that she is kissing a girl on the mouth, but without desire or enthusiasm, despite the strangeness of the dream, this portends the goodness and livelihood that will come to her after a lot of misery and suffering in her life. Seeing a married woman at work among a group of people

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a colorful decorative fish in a dream

preview.html: Seeing colorful fish in a dream Interpretation Seeing colorful decorative fish in a dream is one of the visions of the great benefits that the dreamer will obtain in his coming days. Seeing decorative fish in a dream is also a sign of well-being and living a life full of money and good things. Dreaming of buying ornamental fish means goodness and blessings, and the dreamer gets what he longs for and seeks. Seeing an ornamental fish in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate success, success, and reaching the highest levels of study for the seeker of knowledge. The interpretation of the dream of colorful decorative fish in a dream indicates the end of worries and sorrows, and the fortune teller hears good and happy news. Seeing colorful fish in a dream for a single woman Interpretation of the dream of colorful fish in a dream for a single girl is evidence that she has achieved the highest grades in her academic life. Seeing colorful fish in a dream for a girl also indicates kindness, good conditions, and her entry into a calm and stable life. Seeing someone giving her his decorative fish in a dream indicates the approach of her engagement, marriage, and achieving her happiness. Seeing a girl holding a colorful fish in her hand indicates the great wealth that she will gain in her life and in reaching prestigious positions. Interpretation of a dream of a fish Colorful ornamental fish for a married woman The interpretation of seeing a colorful ornamental fish in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the stability of her marital life and the improvement of her circumstances. Seeing an ornamental fish in a dream for a woman suffering from marital problems is good news that the problems will end and be resolved, God willing. The interpretation of seeing a red fish caught in a dream indicates love, loyalty, and a happy marital life. Seeing a yellow fish in a dream indicates illness and severe fatigue that the woman will suffer from in the coming days. Ornamental fish in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing ornamental fish in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the dreams that indicate a great and wide benefit for her. The interpretation of seeing an ornamental fish swimming in the water in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of an easy and affordable birth. Also, seeing an ornamental fish in a dream indicates the intense fear and anxiety that the woman suffers from. Orange fish in a dream Seeing an orange fish in a dream is evidence of goodness and livelihood and evidence of the recovery of the patient, God willing. If you see yourself buying an orange fish in a dream, this indicates many benefits, good things, and blessings in life. The interpretation of seeing an orange fish in a dream is evidence of an imminent marriage with a righteous girl. Interpretation of a dream Ornamental fish in the sea Seeing an ornamental fish floating in the sea means good and abundant money that the dreamer will earn in his life. Seeing ornamental fish in a dream also indicates useful opportunities and a suitable job. Interpretation of a dream about the death of an ornamental fish The interpretation of seeing the death of an ornamental fish in a dream indicates failure and entering a stage full of difficulties. Also, seeing the death of a colorful fish in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate sadness, anxiety and severe distress. Seeing fish dying in general indicates bad luck and excessive fatigue that the fortune teller will suffer from. If

title: Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream

preview.html: Seeing ants in a dream is generally considered good news in most of the cases we encounter. Let us not forget that ants are mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, specifically in Surat An-Naml, so they are considered one of the positive symbols in a dream, like bees. Whoever sees in his dream that he is talking with an ant, this is his interpretation of intelligence, wisdom, and excellence in the field in which the dreamer (the dreamer) works. Interpretation A dream about ants according to Ibn Sirin: As for ants: they gathered, and seeing them in bed is children, and seeing ants shows the dreamer’s soul, and it is said that it shows kinship, and it is said that the ants coming out of their hole is an ordeal. To see ants bring healing to the sick person, and knowing the words of ants is a testament to the story of Solomon, peace be upon him, and whoever sees ants entering his house with food increases the well-being of his household. And whoever sees ants leaving his house with food is sorry, and the emergence of ants from the nose, ears, or other organs indicates recovery. If he sees himself, he is happy about his exit. If things get worse, he is afraid. Ants are weak and willing individuals and many of them are army, offspring, king or longevity. Whoever sees ants entering a village or country, an army will enter that country. If they leave it they bear it, and if he sees that ants are leaving a country or a house, then thieves will carry something from that place and there will be no construction, because ants and architecture do not meet. . The abundance of ants in a country without harming anyone indicates the abundance of people in the country. Ants in a dream: Interpretation of Nabulsi Ants in a dream are weak and willing individuals, and ants in a dream represent soldiers, policemen, and the family. He felt that the ants in his bed were many of his children. Whoever sees him flying to the place is sick and healed. Ants in a dream indicate money and livelihood. Because it is only in the place of livelihood. If the patient sees that ants are crawling on his body, this is a cure. And whoever sees ants coming out of their well, he will receive the best from his family. And whoever sees ants coming out of the house, let his family say goodbye to him. If ants have wings, this means death or epidemic. Whoever sees ants entering his house with food will increase the welfare of his household, and whoever sees ants leaving his house with food will become poor. The emergence of ants from the nose, ear, or other parts of the body indicates that the fortuneteller has recovered from an illness in the place where he saw the ants. Whoever sees that he is killing an ant, then he is sinning because of his weakness. Whoever listens to the words of the ants and is qualified to rule and lead will succeed, otherwise he will be fruitful and righteous. A large ant is an enemy, a plague, or an unjust ruler, and those who want to travel have their suffering and losses. Interpretation of ants in a dream by Ibn Shaheen, Al-Kirmani, and Imam Al-Sadiq. As for ants, they are explained in several ways. It is said that a large number of ants is interpreted by a large number of people, so whoever sees that there are many ants in his house, he will say “Allah is great.” And whoever sees ants eating something is interpreted as the high price of that thing or its loss. Whoever sees ants leaving his house is interpreted as his people leaving it. Al-Kirmani said that a dream of many ants is interpreted as money and blessings. And whoever sees ants transporting something from his house, this is not It benefits him, but if he moves to his house, it is different. Whoever sees ants coming out of his mouth or nose is interpreted as his recovery, and it is said that a dream about ants means

title: Interpretation of a dream about watermelon by Ibn Sirin |  A symbol of seeing a watermelon in a dream for a married woman and a single woman according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Seeing watermelon in a dream indicates happiness and abundant nutrition, and rotten watermelon in a woman’s dream indicates bad reputation and inability to bear responsibility. It is good to see watermelon in a merchant’s dream, as the vision warns him of the decline of his trade, and watermelon is one of the fruits that many love. Celibacy and the interpretation of watermelon in the case of buying it differs from eating it and seeing it without eating it, and we will explain that to you in detail. The interpretation of seeing biscuits in a dream and its meaning by Ibn Sirin. Watch the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, who saw watermelon in a dream. Al-Nabulsi tells us that an unmarried young man or unmarried girl sees himself cutting a watermelon. In a dream, this vision promises good news for marriage in the near future. Cutting watermelon in a married woman’s dream indicates the love that prevails in this lady’s home, that is, between her and her husband and children. Ibn Sirin explained that watermelon in a dream indicates illness, but in the event of seeing more Of a watermelon at the same time, this indicates many worries and problems that have accumulated in the dreamer’s life. Green watermelon indicates goodness, while immature watermelon indicates problems or corruption in morals and religion. Seeing a white watermelon inside is good health, but red watermelon shows danger. Illness, and God knows the unseen. Al-Nabulsi also explained some concepts in which he agreed with Ibn Sirin, which is that seeing watermelon in a dream is better than a dream in which you may see watermelon far away from you and cannot eat it. Eating watermelon comes after distress, distress, and abundant food that comes to the dreamer. In a prisoner’s dream, it may indicate getting out of prison and enjoying life. In a dream of a single woman about to get married, watermelon indicates love and a really close relationship. Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Ibn Al-Sadiq believes that watermelon in a dream carries five important meanings that he must know, Namely: Watermelon is a serious disease that can affect insight. Sometimes it also refers to women and the world, as the smooth rind of watermelon reflects a woman’s good qualities and calm, while the rough rind reflects strength of character and authoritarianism. Eating watermelon is food, contentment, and happiness, not eating it as distress or illness. Ibn Al-Khattab added The truth is that watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a male child, and God knows what is in the wombs. Eating sweet red watermelon is a wonderful sign of a stable life and survival in the future according to the visionaries. In the dream of a divorced woman, this indicates the benefits that can be provided to her and it may be a reward. Great from God.Interpretation of green watermelon in a dream by Ibn ShaheenIbn Shaheen Al Dhaheri explained that seeing watermelon in a dream varies according to the psychological and social state that the viewer is experiencing, not only but also according to the type of watermelon, whether it is red in color or very green. The vision has its meanings, which are as follows: Green watermelon is a source of halal money that comes to the person with the vision and great benefits. Ibn Shaheen believes that any green watermelon out of season has good visions, but if you see yellow watermelon out of season, serious illness and poverty. Green watermelon in

title: Interpretation of a dream about King Salman in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about King Salman in a dream for unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream about King Salman bin Abdulaziz in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will have a great interest in the future and that his status will improve greatly among everyone who knows him. His vision has many interpretations and connotations, and through this article we will We explain the interpretation of a dream about King Salman in a dream for single and married women, and all the interpretations that interpret it, it is the same. It is a common dream for many people in the world. Interpretation of seeing a king in a dream: This dream has many interpretations and connotations. Some interpretations are good and others are reprehensible. Below are the interpretations of seeing a dream about the king in a dream: When you see King Salman bin Abdulaziz sitting with him on the throne, or even kissing the king, hugging him, and talking to him, the interpretation of this dream is good, abundant, and broad, God willing, as he rises. Among the people. In the event that you see a king from a country other than the country in which the dreamer lives, the interpretation of this dream is that the dreamer will travel to that city where the king lives, and the doors of endless livelihood and goodwill are open before him, and he will assume a great position and work in this country. Since seeing King R in a dream is considered one of the good visions that indicate the fairness of religious conditions and the disposition of all the concerns of the person having the vision. See also: Interpretation of a dream about watermelon in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of a dream about King Salman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin is considered one of the scholars of interpretation and has many books that interpret Many different dreams. The interpretation of seeing a dream by Ibn Sirin is as follows: Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing the king in a dream is good news for the dreamer, and an indication that the dreamer will obtain a great and famous position in the near future. It is, as he interpreted it, an indication of the person’s resignation, and evidence of his tendency to devote Himself to obey God Almighty, and that he has good morals. Ibn Sirin also indicated that seeing Arab kings and rulers in a dream is a good omen, that is, they are opposed to seeing non-Arab rulers, because seeing an Arab king in a dream is a good sign for those who have it. The vision is an indication of his reaching a great position. But if the vision is about the ruler of a foreign country, it is a sign of his grave injustice and an indication of alienation from the homeland and family. King Salman is considered one of the best kings and rulers of the Arab countries, because the king of distinguished countries is the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and therefore his vision is worthy Praise. See also: Interpretation of a dream about feces in a dream for a pregnant womanInterpretation of a dream about seeing King Salman in a dream for NabulsiSeeing King Salman in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will obtain a lot of good in his life, and the interpretation of dreaming about seeing King Salman in a dream from Nabulsi is as follows: Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of this dream was that when you see the king’s crown in a dream, this is a sign and an indication. If the dreamer sees him dead in his dream, this is good news, and that he will enjoy great power and a great fortune of money. But if one sees in a dream that he is arguing with the king, this is a sign However, he will achieve joy in his heart while seeing the king’s house in a dream

But if one sees in a dream that he is arguing with the king, this is a sign However, he will achieve joy in his heart while seeing the king’s house in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about my sister kissing me on the mouth in a dream

Likewise, kissing a girl on the mouth in a dream could indicate marriage, and God knows the unseen. If a girl sees someone she knows kissing her on the mouth, this may mean that she will receive a blessing, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream My sister hennaed for me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister who hennaed for me in a dream. Perhaps drawing henna is good and happy, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a henna inscription in a dream, this means that she gets rid of problems and worries, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees a henna inscription in a dream, this may indicate that Goodness and happiness for the girl, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a divorced woman sees a henna inscription, this may indicate that she is approaching marriage, traveling, or fulfilling her desire, and God knows best. When she sees a sister drinking alcohol, it may show other people’s money during the time, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, while drinking alcohol sometimes may express happiness and comfort, and God knows the unseen. Whereas if the dreamer sees a happy sister in a dream, it can It is a sign of goodness and blessings, and God is All-Knowing. If a married woman sees a happy sister in a dream, this may represent sharing and cooperation, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees that she is breastfeeding a child, she may express anxiety and sorrow, and God knows the unseen, while the interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child for an unmarried girl may indicate marriage, and God is Most High. I know that seeing a child breastfeeding an unmarried girl in a dream may indicate his livelihood, and God knows best

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a naked husband in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a naked husband in a dream: There are many dreams that we see in a dream, and all of these dreams either indicate reality or the opposite, and they could be the result of what a person is busy with in his life or the abundance of these worries and problems, and among these dreams is seeing a husband naked. Interpreters have come up with an interpretation of dreaming of a naked husband in a dream, according to the condition of the dreamer, whether he is a man or woman, married or single. Interpretation of dreaming of a naked husband in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreaming of a naked husband in a dream is one of the dreams that many people dream of. They search for its interpretation to know what this vision has in store for them, whether good or bad, as the interpretation is as follows: This dream symbolizes many interpretations, such as: This husband is always busy with a difficult issue in his life, such as a legal issue, and this issue has not She is permissible. But if the wife sees that her husband is naked in a dream and she will see his private parts, then this dream indicates that this wife has a kind of intelligence, courage, strength, and ability to protect her husband, her home, and her children from loss, and this woman will be a cover for him in his life, and God knows best. When she sees a woman in a dream Her husband is naked and walking on a road where there is no one, and she does not know where his house is, this indicates that the husband will face many crises in his next life. He does not know how to get rid of these crises and survive them, and God knows best. But if the wife sees that her husband is exposing his private parts in front of her in a dream, this means that this husband wants to prove to his wife that he is characterized by masculinity and fertility, and God knows best. But if the married woman sees in her dream that there A strange, naked man in a dream, and she sees his private parts and is happy with him, then this dream is interpreted as meaning that she will encounter some marital problems in the coming days. When a married woman sees a strange man and sees his private parts, she is amazed at this sight. This dream indicates that there are some problems in her life and she will get rid of them. From her soon, God willing. The concept of a pregnant woman dreaming of her husband naked in a dream. If a pregnant woman sees her husband taking off his clothes in front of her in a dream, this indicates that this pregnant woman is always in a constant state of sadness. It may also indicate that this husband may get sick or contract a serious illness. It may lead to his life, and he will regret it greatly. If a pregnant woman sees that her husband is naked in a dream and his brother or father covers him, this means that the husband will be exposed to serious harm in his life and that the father or brother is the one who will stand by him, until these circumstances and crises are overcome. It passes by. When a pregnant woman sees that her husband is naked in front of her in a dream, and this husband is a religious man and is not ashamed of exposing his nakedness in front of her, this indicates that this man will be increased in knowledge and religion by God. Interpretation of seeing a person seeing himself naked in a dreamIf a person sees himself naked In a dream, this indicates that this person is mentally ill and unstable in his work, but also unstable in his life. When a person sees in a dream that he is naked in front of people, the interpretation of this is

title: Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision website roy2a.com. This is for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man, a young man and a divorced woman. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a girl in a dream? Seeing a beautiful girl in a dream according to Ibn Sirin means a lot of sustenance and blessings with health and children. Seeing a young girl in a dream means bringing goodness, blessings and happiness to the foresight. Seeing an ugly girl in a dream indicates that she is causing trouble and problems to the priest and the deterioration of his health. Seeing a familiar girl in a dream and wearing a bad dress means her imminent death. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a young girl in a dream in detail. What is the interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream about a single girl? An unmarried girl. A married woman sees a beautiful girl in a dream. Wearing a very beautiful dress means her relationship with a young man of good conduct and morals. An unmarried girl sees a beautiful young girl in a dream. It symbolizes the next good thing for her, which is money, wealth, or high status. Seeing a girl whose health is weak in a dream indicates that she will be exposed to some problems. In work and family life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a newborn baby or baby girl in a dream in detail. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing a girl in a dream? A married woman seeing a calm and beautiful girl in a dream is a great good sign in her home, and for her husband who brings her happiness and money. Married woman Seeing a baby girl in a dream indicates marital problems that may be resolved soon. Seeing a married woman carrying a beautiful girl in a dream means that she is facing some problems in delaying her pregnancy, but she will get pregnant soon. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing a girl in a dream? A pregnant woman seeing a girl in a dream indicates wearing luxurious clothes. For her future recovery and the facilitation of all her affairs. Seeing a pregnant girl in a dream means that she will give birth to a handsome and calm boy. Seeing an ugly girl indicates dealing with some birth problems and feeling severe pain. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a girl with a mustache in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a newborn in a dream? A vision. A girl giving birth in a dream, whether it is an infant or an adult, shows the opening of the door of livelihood for the pioneer and obtaining lawful money from his hardships and misery. Seeing a baby girl in a dream for a young man or man means achieving success that pleases the family and relatives and obtaining the highest degrees. Seeing a beautiful girl in a dream for a merchant or farmer is It symbolizes profits, exorbitant profits and good luck in one’s life. Seeing a girl in a young man’s dream indicates the strength of the relationship and love between him and his family and relatives. Seeing a young man for a young man means the nearness of marriage and the success of her romantic relationship, and for a pregnant woman who gives birth easily, she is married to a good, handsome boy. Seeing a woman Pregnant with a girl in a dream means the blessing of his married life and its righteous children. What is Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing a young girl in a dream? Seeing a young girl in a dream by Ibn Shaheen It means the goodness that comes and the knowledge that he benefits from

title: Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a mobile phone in a dream through today’s encyclopedia article. Although the mobile phone is one of the modern means of communication, a person often dreams of seeing it on many occasions, but does not know what its interpretation is. Maybe the reason for this is that it is one of the media that never leaves our hands anytime and anywhere. Through it, we also hear a group of good news that transforms our lives from misery to happiness, and thus it is a means of joy and goodness, and in other cases it is a source of hearing the worst news and here it is a source of evil, so many differ in the interpretation of the dream of a mobile phone, but in the following lines we present to you the consequences. The good and evil related to seeing it in detail, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone in a dream. Meanings of kindness when you see a mobile phone in a dream. We cannot limit ourselves to interpreting the dream of a mobile phone in a dream to see it, because there are a group of small details that must be paid attention to because they make the interpretation of the vision different from one case to another. Other. Among these details is the condition of the dreamer in a dream when he uses a mobile phone. If he is happy, this is an indication of the good news that he will hear soon. Interpreters also agreed that the mobile phone in a dream is interpreted according to its name in reality. If it is called a cell phone, it is a sign of pregnancy for a married woman who is with God. Because it is a manifestation of modern technology that many people are not proficient with, its presence in the dream is an indication of how intelligent the dreamer is, as well as his ability to quickly acquire knowledge. The color of the mobile phone is It is also a sign that helps you interpret the dream. If it is white or red, this is a sign of the happy and joyful news that he will hear soon. Acquiring a new mobile phone in a dream, or buying it, is a sign of great goodness and happiness that the dreamer will enjoy. It can be a sign of marriage if he is single. The mobile phone in general symbolizes the high status that the viewer enjoys among his peers and his ability to achieve all the dreams he wants in reality. Evil signs in seeing a mobile phone in a dream If the fortuneteller finds himself in a dream talking on the phone Mobile phone, and he was sad or saddened by this call, then his dream is a sign of the coming of worries and sorrows, God forbid. Dropping the line during the conversation, or losing the ability to communicate with the caller, is a warning sign of the need to pay attention to the kinship relationship, because the viewer may experience separation from the family. . Or relatives. A mobile phone falling to the ground by collapsing does not bode well, as it is a sign of revealing the dreamer’s secret that he was hiding from everyone. A dream of losing a mobile phone is evidence that the dreamer is exposed to many problems, whether they are related to his private life, the level of his work, or his studies. In If a mobile phone is damaged in a dream, it warns its owner of many problems with those around him. Therefore, we find that seeing a mobile phone has different interpretations depending on many details, including its condition.

title: Interpretation of seeing mirrors in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing mirrors in a dream through the website vision roy2a.com, mirrors reflect light and are used for decoration and seeing oneself after wearing clothes, and today through this article we will provide you with the interpretation of seeing mirrors in a dream for great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the status of the seer, whether male, single or married. Interpretation of seeing mirrors in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that he sees mirrors in a dream, and they indicate that the seer is a religiously loyal person who enjoys good qualities and a good reputation. The dreamer sees that his appearance is beautiful in the mirrors in a dream. It indicates the dreamer's desire to achieve something and his search for it. The dreamer sees that his appearance is ugly in the mirror in a dream. It indicates the poor financial conditions of the visionary during this period. A black face in mirrors in a dream indicates that the fortune teller has a good reputation among people. Broken mirrors in a dream indicate that the priest will hear unpleasant news in the coming days. Large mirrors in a dream indicate a feeling of introversion and loneliness. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing myself in mirrors in Dream Interpretation of seeing mirrors in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted the dreamer's vision of looking beautiful in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer has many good qualities. Seeing the dreamer's eyes in the mirrors in a dream indicates the emergence of promising things in the dreamer's life. A woman looks at her beauty in the mirror. It indicates a happy and stable married life. Seeing a man looking at mirrors in a dream indicates many happy things in his life during the coming period. Interpretation of seeing mirrors in a dream for a single woman Seeing in a dream a single woman looking in mirrors indicates that she will meet a suitable young man with high morals. Looking in mirrors in a dream for a single woman announces to him very good and spacious food. Seeing a beautiful-looking unmarried woman in a dream shows that he will get married soon. The ugly appearance in the mirrors in a dream for a single woman confirms that she will face many crises and arguments during her marriage. Broken mirrors in a single woman's dream indicate that there are many crises between them and their life partner. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a picture in a dream Interpretation of seeing mirrors in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman with a beautiful face in The dream states that he will hear a lot of good news this year, and God knows best. The beautiful face in the mirror in a dream for a married woman also indicates that God will carry her soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman looking at mirrors in a dream indicates the extent of the connection and compatibility between her and her husband. Interpretation of seeing mirrors in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman that her face is beautiful in the mirrors in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Looking at mirrors in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that God will relieve her distress and remove her worries in the coming season. Seeing a pregnant woman looking at broken mirrors in a dream shows that she will face some problems
